issue.title: Remove SLA on Job tab
issue.body:
**Original author :** Larsen de Martino Jorgen

The advanced SLA tab has been implemented(#271) and will be a part of version 2.1. 

I suggest removal of the SLA options on the Job tab since it in my view has become obsolete with the introduction of the SLA setup tab.

In addition to being obsolete it will be confusing for the user to have 2 SLA possibilities.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

OK for me, that's make sense.

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

I guess it's a new feature and not a defect, right?

**Original author :** Larsen de Martino Jorgen

I agree

**Original author :** Larsen de Martino Jorgen

When are ad it - What about user name and password on the Job tab - can that be removed too?

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This is an old and very specific ticket & the community plans to make a large MONITOR refactoring.

Therefore, this ticket is rejected.
